error.remote.path.exists: Path does not exist on the remote server
error.validation.cron: The crontab appears to be invalid
error.validation.project.code: A project code can only contain alphanumeric characters
error.validation.unique: %value% is already used by another record
error.validation.server.used: Server %data% is still in use by one or more projects
error.validation.varnish.memory: Cannot assign %requested% Mb of memory, server has %free% Mb available
label.backup.destination.description: Restore destination for the selected backup
label.backup.name.description: Custom name for the backup. Custom backups are never automatically deleted.
label.backup.none: There are no backups at the moment.
label.backup.select.description: Available backups to restore or download
label.builders.build.description: Select the builders which should be invoked
label.builders.none: There are no builders for this branch.
label.builder.automatic.description: Automatically build when the branch receives a new commit
label.builder.checkout.description: Checkout the repository to the working directory of this builder
label.builder.manager.description: Implementation which handles the build script
label.builder.script.description:
Commands which should be executed to build and/or test this branch. One command per line.
You can use the variables [[branch]], [[dir]], [[repository]] and [[revision]].
label.cron.description: Automated tasks to be run on %server%.
label.cron.none: There are no automated tasks for this project.
label.cron.tab.description:
Crontab of the automated tasks
Syntax: [minute] [hour] [day] [month] [weekday] [script]
eg. 0 5 * * 1 /path/to/script to run script every week at 5:00
label.database.name.description: Name of the database which is always prefixed with the username
label.databases.none: There are no databases for this project.
label.delete.project.description: All services and users will be disabled and deleted from the active servers.
label.deployers.deploy.description: Select the deployers which should be invoked
label.deployers.none: There are no deployers for this branch.
label.deployer.automatic.description: Automatically deploy when the branch receives a new commit
label.deployer.environment.description: Preset the connection settings with the selected environment
label.deployer.exclude.description:
One exclude pattern per line.
eg folder/file.txt, folder/*txt, **/*txt
label.deployer.host.description: Hostname or IP address of the remote server
label.deployer.password.description: Password to authenticate with the remote server
label.deployer.path.remote.description: Destination path on the remote server
label.deployer.revision.description: Revision of the last successful deploy. Leave empty if uncertain.
label.deployer.script.description:
Commands to be executed when deploying this branch. One command per line.
You can use the variables [[branch]], [[dir]], [[repository]] and [[revision]].
label.deployer.username.description: Username to identify with the remote server
label.environments.none: There are no environments for this project.
label.environment.alias.description: Additional internet domains, one domain for each line
label.key-chain.ssh-keys.description: SSH keys attached to this key chain
label.manager.cron.description: Implementation which manages a user's crontab
label.manager.deploy.description: How are you deploying to this environment?
label.manager.web.description: Implementation which manages the web hosting
label.messages.none: There are no messages for this project.
label.notes.none: There are no notes for this project.
label.php.ini.description: Tweak your PHP configuration like you are editing your php.ini file
label.php.version.description: PHP version your scripts will be running
label.project.code.description: Code for the project, this is also the username for the servers
label.project.key-chains.description: Allowed key chains for the user of this project
label.project.name.description: Human friendly name for this project
label.project.notes.description: Custom notes and reminders for the project. The text will be rendered as markdown.
label.project.ssh-keys.description: Allowed SSH keys for the user of this project
label.project.ssh-keys.none: There are no SSH keys for this project.
label.server.key.public: To enable authentication, add the following public key to the .ssh/authorized_keys file on your server. It needs to be stored in the home directory of the user you are using for your connection and should have permissions set to 0600.
label.server.key.public.command: You can use the following command to add the public key to your authorized_keys file:
label.server.test.description: You are about to test the connection to %server%.
label.ssl.certificate-key.description: Contents of your certificate key file
label.ssl.common-name.description: Domain where the certificate is active
label.ssl.email.description: Email address of the certificate holder
label.version.php.description: Select the PHP version of this environment
label.varnish.delete.description: Are you sure you want to power off Varnish running on %server%?
label.varnish.description: Varnish cache initialized with %memory% of memory.
label.varnish.none: There is no Varnish cache setup for this project.
label.varnish.restart.description: Are you sure you want to restart Varnish running on %server%?
label.vcl.description: Varnish configuration language to tweak the cache
manager.auth.ssh: Useradd and deluser commands over SSH
manager.database.mysql.driver: Direct connection to the MySQL server
manager.ssl.le: Certificate from the Let's Encrypt service
manager.varnish.ssh: Varnishadm connection with VCL push over SSH
success.builders.queued: The selected builders have been queued for invocation
success.deployers.queued: The selected deployers have been queued for invocation
success.varnish.deleted: %data% has been queued for power off.
success.varnish.restarted: %data% has been queued for a restart.
warning.project.ssh-key.delete: The SSH key is managed by a key chain and cannot be deleted individually
warning.repository.status.new: This repository is waiting to be initialized.
